conversations.english: Now,you are to board the plane.We're sorry that we haven't done much to help you when you stayed in China.
conversations.chinese: 现在你要登机了。很抱歉，你在中国的时候我们对你的帮助很不够。
conversations.reply_english: I appreciate what you have done for me.Everything I have seen here has left a deep impression on me. I really don't know how to express my thanks to you.
conversations.reply_chinese: 十分感谢你对我的关照。在中国见到的一切给我留下了深刻的印象。我真不知道怎样感谢你们。

conversations.reply_english: Good morning, Jamie. What time is it now?

title: 这是我们的食品样品室

conversations.reply_english: You've got a large collection of sample foodstuffs here.
conversations.reply_chinese: 你们这里展出的食品样品种类很丰富。

conversations.english: Good morning. My name is John Smith. I'm an import manager.
conversations.chinese: 早上好，我叫约翰·史密斯，我是进口部门的一名经理。
conversations.reply_english: How do you do, Mr. Smith? My name is Zhou Hong.
conversations.reply_chinese: 您好，史密斯先生！我叫周红。这是我的名片。

title: 有没有发现感兴趣的商品

conversations.english: Good afternoon. I am Mr. Brown, the Import manager of Atlantic Industries Ltd, Sidney, Australia. This is my card.
conversations.chinese: 下午好！我是布朗先生，是澳大利亚悉尼大西洋工业有限公司进口部经理。这是我的名片。
conversations.reply_english: Good afternoon, Mr. Brown. My name is Mrs. Anderson, manager of the sales department.
conversations.reply_chinese: 布朗先生，下午好！我是安德森女士，销售部的经理。

title: 我对你们的五金产品感兴趣

conversations.english: I’m glad to have the opportunity of visiting your corporation. I hope to conclude some substantial business with you.
conversations.chinese: 我很高兴有这个机会参观你们公司。我希望能与您谈下大笔生意。
conversations.reply_english: It’s a great pleasure to meet you, Mr. Brown. I believe you have seen our exhibits in the showroom. May I know what particular items you’re interested in?
conversations.reply_chinese: 很高兴见到您，布朗先生。我想您已经看过我们展示厅里的产品了。 可否知道您具体对哪些商品感兴趣？

conversations.english: I’ll show you around and explain the operation as we go along.
conversations.chinese: 我陪你到各处看看，边走边讲解生产操作。

title: 我们产品是独一无二的

conversations.english: Can you tell me more about your products?
conversations.chinese: 你能给我讲一下你们产品的详细情况吗?
conversations.reply_english: Yes, I'd be happy to. Let me tell you this,we are ahead of the competition because our products have advanced technology.
conversations.reply_chinese: 没问题,我很荣幸.我先告诉你这样一个事实,由于我们产品采用了先进的技术,现在我们在竞争中遥遥领先.

conversations.english: When can I have your firm C.I.F. prices, that is to say, the final offer, Mr. London?
conversations.chinese: 伦敦先生，什么时候能给我你们公司确认的到岸价格，那就是最后的报价？
conversations.reply_english: We’ll have them worked out by this evening and let you have them tomorrow morning. Would you be free to come by then?
conversations.reply_chinese: 我们将在今晚制定出来，明天早上让你拿到。到时你有时间过来吗？

conversations.english: These three hours chatting with you have been very...interesting. Could you please tell us why we're here?
conversations.chinese: 和你聊这三个小时还真……有意思啊。能否请教你，我们到此的目的到底是什么呢？
conversations.reply_english: I want a new brand image. Something creative, something strong. Make no mistake, something with...resolve!
conversations.reply_chinese: 我想要一个新的品牌形象。来点有创意的、有力量的。不会让人搞混的，是……强而有力的！

conversations.english: How long will it take for our order to be delivered?
conversations.chinese: 要过多长时间我们订的货才能送到?
conversations.reply_english: Let's see. You are importing fifty containers of textiles from China. They should be able to place your order before the end of next week. It will take 2 days for shipping to the port city of Ningbo. The freight will take 3 weeks on the open ocean and will arrive in Los Angeles approximately a month from today. Domestic shipping will be your responsibility, you can make arrangements with the pier in Los Angeles.
conversations.reply_chinese: 我看一下....你要从中国进口55个集装箱的纺织品.他们应该在下周末之前下订单.运到宁波港需要两天时间.货运在公海上还需要三周时间,到达洛杉矶的时间从今天算起大约在一个月以后.国内运输由你们自己负责,你们可以和洛杉矶码头达成协议.

title: 找一位在这儿工作的人

conversations.reply_english: I'm looking for someone who works here, but I lost his business card. His name's Jong or Jang or something like that.
conversations.reply_chinese: 我在找一位在这儿工作的人，但是我弄丢他的名片了。他姓蒋或是简之类的。

conversations.english: Mr. Drake, I'm pleased to do business with your company.
conversations.chinese: 爵克先生，非常荣幸能跟贵公司合作。
conversations.reply_english: We're glad to be able to offer our services to your business, Mrs. Wayne.
conversations.reply_chinese: 伟恩女士，我们也很高兴能为贵公司提供服务。
